hero.title: Creating Bright Smiles
hero.subtitle: SmileLux creates radiant smiles with expertise, technology, and dedication

sections.cosmetic_desc: Achieve a natural, radiant smile with Veneer solutions – addressing discolored, chipped, slightly misaligned, and unharmonious teeth.
sections.implant_desc: Restore missing teeth with modern Implant solutions – safe, stable, ensuring natural chewing function and aesthetics like real teeth.
sections.orthodontics_desc: Achieve straight, beautiful teeth and improved bite with transparent or bracket orthodontic methods.
sections.general_desc: Comprehensive oral health care: teeth whitening, filling, root canal treatment, wisdom tooth extraction, periodontal care, and family care packages.
sections.before_after_desc: Each before-after image is a milestone in the journey where SmileLux accompanies customers to regain radiant smiles and greater confidence every day.
sections.doctors_desc: Dedicated, experienced doctors – accompanying you on your smile care journey
sections.consultation_desc: Private, friendly space - where doctors listen and create personalized treatment plans for each customer.
sections.xray_desc: Equipped with advanced imaging technology, helping accurately detect dental conditions and develop optimal treatment plans.
sections.treatment_desc: Meeting sterile standards, integrating modern equipment to support safe and accurate Implant surgery and restoration.
sections.testimonials_desc: Customer trust is the clearest evidence of SmileLux's quality.
sections.why_choose_desc: SmileLux provides medical-standard dental experience with modern technology, transparent costs, long-term warranty policy, and absolute sterile procedures – helping each customer feel confident on their journey to creating happy smiles.
sections.modern_tech_desc: 3D Scan application for accurate diagnosis and optimal treatment planning.
sections.transparent_cost_desc: Clear pricing, no hidden fees, and diverse payment methods.
sections.sterile_standard_desc: Complying with international sterile standards, ensuring absolute customer safety.
sections.long_warranty_desc: Transparent warranty policy, long-term customer support.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: At SmileLux, we believe that every smile carries its own story. With our dedicated team of doctors and modern technology, SmileLux brings safe, aesthetic, and effective dental solutions.

mission_vision.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission_vision.subtitle: SmileLux hopes that every customer, wherever they are, has the opportunity to access quality, safe, and dedicated dental services.

mission.title: SmileLux Mission
mission.description: Bringing medical-standard dental solutions that are safe and dedicated – creating healthy, beautiful, and sustainable smiles for each customer.

vision.title: SmileLux Vision
vision.description: SmileLux pioneers digitalizing the dental journey so every customer can own radiant smiles

core_values.title: Core Values
core_values.description: Customer-centric – Dedicated service – Continuous innovation – Vietnamese identity, international standards.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Every SmileLux branch is built according to international standards and medical standards, bringing absolute peace of mind to customers.

awards.title: Awards & Achievements
awards.subtitle: These achievements are proof of the reputation and quality at SmileLux

top_dental.title: Top Dental Practice in Vietnam
top_dental.description: Honored by prestigious medical organizations, pioneering in implant, orthodontics and medical-standard porcelain dental aesthetics.

excellent_service.title: Excellent Customer Service
excellent_service.description: Affirming the dedicated care process, close follow-up after treatment, bringing absolute satisfaction to customers.

iso.title: ISO 9001:2015 Certification
iso.description: Applying international quality management systems, ensuring all treatment processes meet the highest safety and efficiency standards.

straumann.title: Straumann Certification (Switzerland)
straumann.description: The team of doctors are trained and certified by Straumann, guaranteeing precise and safe implant techniques.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: SmileLux was founded with the mission to accompany Vietnamese people on the journey of comprehensive oral health care. Every step of development, every branch established is a continuous effort to create radiant smiles and peaceful lives for thousands of customers.

2024.title: Founding & Foundation
2024.description: This is the first milestone marking the mission "Creating Happy Smiles" – where smiles are not only beautiful but also healthy and sustainable.

2025.title: Expansion & Recognition
2025.description: The SmileLux system expanded to Ho Chi Minh City and Da Nang, invested in 3D Scan technology, international sterile standards and leading specialist teams. In the same year, SmileLux was honored to receive the "Top Dental Practice in Vietnam" award, affirming its pioneering position in aesthetic dentistry.

stats.title: About Us
stats.subtitle: We aim not only to care for oral health, but also to spread confidence and joy to each customer, accompanying you on the journey to create radiant smiles.

index.title: Our Professional Services
index.subtitle: Professional technical services by SmileLux
index.description: At SmileLux, we focus not only on expertise but also on customer experience and emotions.

services.empty_desc: Currently no services are being offered.

show.author: Author
show.highlights_item1: Natural & Harmonious: Tooth color and shape are individually designed according to each customer's face and smile.
show.highlights_item2: Minimal Invasiveness: Doctors only gently polish the outer enamel, ensuring no impact on the pulp and tooth structure.
show.highlights_item3: 3D Smile Design Technology: Allows customers to preview results and adjust according to their wishes before implementation.
show.highlights_item4: Long-term Care & Warranty: After treatment, customers are monitored regularly to maintain healthy, beautiful, sustainable smiles.

hero.title: Medical Team
hero.description: At SmileLux, our team of doctors is the heart of the journey to create happy smiles. Each expert has a solid professional foundation, medical-standard skills, and dedication in every treatment case. Not only focusing on technique, the SmileLux team also accompanies customers with understanding – so that every smile is not only beautiful in form, but also complete in emotion and long-term health.

experts.title: Expert Team
experts.description: Experienced team of doctors, deeply trained and always updating the latest techniques in dentistry.

qualifications.title: Certifications & Qualifications
qualifications.description: The SmileLux team is trained and certified by prestigious medical organizations domestically and internationally.

straumann.title: Straumann Certification
straumann.description: Trained and certified by Straumann (Switzerland) on precise and safe implant techniques.

iso.title: ISO 9001:2015
iso.description: Applying international quality management systems, ensuring all treatment processes meet safety standards.

international.title: International Certification
international.description: Trained at leading universities and hospitals worldwide in dentistry.

continuous.title: Continuous Updates
continuous.description: Participating in courses and international seminars to update the latest techniques in dentistry.

hero.title: What Customers Say About SmileLux
hero.description: Each before-after image is a milestone in the journey where SmileLux accompanies customers to regain radiant smiles and greater confidence every day.

booking.subtitle: GET THE LATEST INFORMATION
booking.title: Free Consultation
booking.description: Sign up now to receive free consultation from SmileLux's expert team and discover leading dental services.

questions.q1: Does SmileLux offer free consultation services?
questions.q2: What are the steps in the veneer/braces/implant process at SmileLux?
questions.q2_answer:
All services at SmileLux follow 4 standard medical steps:

1. Consultation & General Examination
2. 3D Scan Diagnosis – Treatment Plan Development
3. Main Treatment Implementation (veneer, braces, implant...)
4. Post-Treatment Care & Warranty.

The process is personalized for each customer to achieve optimal results.
questions.q3: What is the average treatment time?
questions.q4: Are free follow-up visits available after treatment?
